<script>
// å…¨å±€å˜é‡ï¼Œä¾›ä¾§è¾¹æ ä½¿ç”¨
window.searchData = [];

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async function() {
  // ==================== æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ ====================

      const notSections = !item.href.includes('sections/');
      return hasTitle && hasText && notIndex && notSections;

    searchInput.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {

        const query = searchInput.value.trim();

    // ç‚¹å‡»å¤–éƒ¨å…³é—­æœç´¢ç»“æœ
    document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {

        searchResults.classList.remove('visible');

  // é«˜äº®å…³é”®è¯
  function highlightKeywords(text, keywords) {
    if (!text) return '';
    let result = text.replace(/</g, '&lt;').replace(/>/g, '&gt;');
    keywords.forEach(kw => {
      if (kw.length < 2) return;
      const regex = new RegExp(`(${kw.replace(/[.*+?^${}()|[\]\\]/g, '\\$&')})`, 'gi');
      result = result.replace(regex, '<span class="search-highlight">$1</span>');
    });
    return result;
  }
  
  // æ‰§è¡Œæœç´¢
  function performSearch(query) {
    const lowerQuery = query.toLowerCase();
    const keywords = lowerQuery.split(/\s+/).filter(k => k.length >= 2);
    let results = [];
    
    searchData.forEach(item => {
      const title = (item.title || '').toLowerCase();
      const text = (item.text || '').toLowerCase();
      const section = (item.section || '').toLowerCase();
      const desc = (item.description || '').toLowerCase();
      
      let match = false;
      if (currentSearchFilter === 'all') {
        match = keywords.some(kw => title.includes(kw) || text.includes(kw) || section.includes(kw));
      } else if (currentSearchFilter === 'title') {
        match = keywords.some(kw => title.includes(kw));
      } else if (currentSearchFilter === 'content') {
        match = keywords.some(kw => text.includes(kw));
      } else if (currentSearchFilter === 'abstract') {
        match = keywords.some(kw => desc.includes(kw) || section.includes(kw));
      }
      
      if (match) {
        let snippet = '';
        const searchText = currentSearchFilter === 'abstract' ? (item.description || item.text || '') : (item.text || '');
        const lowerSearchText = searchText.toLowerCase();
        const idx = lowerSearchText.indexOf(keywords[0]);
        if (idx >= 0) {
          const start = Math.max(0, idx - 20);
          const end = Math.min(searchText.length, idx + 80);
          snippet = (start > 0 ? '...' : '') + searchText.substring(start, end) + (end < searchText.length ? '...' : '');
        } else {
          snippet = searchText.substring(0, 80) + '...';
        }
        results.push({
          title: item.title,
          section: item.section || '',
          href: item.href,
          snippet: snippet
        });
      }
    });
    
    results = results.slice(0, 8);
    
    // æ¸²æŸ“è¿‡æ»¤æ å’Œç»“æœ
    const filterBar = `
      <div class="search-filter-bar">
        <button class="search-filter-btn ${currentSearchFilter === 'all' ? 'active' : ''}" data-filter="all">å…¨éƒ¨</button>
        <button class="search-filter-btn ${currentSearchFilter === 'title' ? 'active' : ''}" data-filter="title">æ ‡é¢˜</button>
        <button class="search-filter-btn ${currentSearchFilter === 'content' ? 'active' : ''}" data-filter="content">å†…å®¹</button>
        <button class="search-filter-btn ${currentSearchFilter === 'abstract' ? 'active' : ''}" data-filter="abstract">æ‘˜è¦</button>
      </div>
    `;
    
    if (results.length > 0) {
      const resultItems = results.map(r => `
        <a href="${r.href}" class="search-result-item">
          <div class="result-header">
            ${r.section ? `<span class="result-section">${highlightKeywords(r.section, keywords)}</span>` : ''}
            <span class="result-title">${highlightKeywords(r.title, keywords)}</span>
          </div>
          <div class="result-snippet">${highlightKeywords(r.snippet, keywords)}</div>
        </a>
      `).join('');
      searchResults.innerHTML = filterBar + resultItems;
    } else {
      searchResults.innerHTML = filterBar + '<div class="search-result-item"><div class="result-snippet">æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°åŒ¹é…çš„ç»“æœ</div></div>';
    }
    searchResults.classList.add('visible');
    
    // ç»‘å®šè¿‡æ»¤æŒ‰é’®äº‹ä»¶
    searchResults.querySelectorAll('.search-filter-btn').forEach(btn => {
      btn.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        e.stopPropagation();
        currentSearchFilter = btn.dataset.filter;
        performSearch(searchInput.value.trim());
      });
    });
  }
  
  // ==================== å†…å®¹æ ‡ç­¾åˆ‡æ¢ ====================
  const contentTabs = document.querySelectorAll('.content-tab');

  function getImagePath(href) {

    return imageMap[basename] || `images/${basename}-cover.svg`;
  }

  
  // ä» searchData ç”Ÿæˆå¡ç‰‡ HTML
  function generateCard(item) {
    const href = item.href || '#';
    const title = item.title || 'æ— æ ‡é¢˜';
    const section = item.section || '';
    const text = item.text || '';
    const desc = text.replace(/```[\s\S]*?```/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, ' ').substring(0, 100) + '...';
    const imagePath = getImagePath(href);
    
    return `
      <div class="quarto-grid-item card h-100 card-left borderless">
        <p class="card-img-top">
          <img loading="lazy" src="${imagePath}" class="thumbnail-image card-img" style="height: 180px;" onerror="this.parentElement.style.display='none'">
        </p>
        <a href="${href}" class="quarto-grid-link">
          <div class="card-body post-contents">
            <h5 class="no-anchor card-title listing-title">${title}</h5>
            ${section ? `<div class="listing-categories"><div class="listing-category">${section}</div></div>` : ''}
            <div class="card-text listing-description delink">${desc}</div>
          </div>
        </a>
      </div>
    `;
  }
  
  contentTabs.forEach(tab => {

      contentTabs.forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'));

      if (sortMode === 'recent') {
        // æœ€è¿‘æ›´æ–° - æ¢å¤åŸå§‹é¡ºåº
        listingContainer.innerHTML = originalHTML;

        // çƒ­é—¨/éšæœº - ä»æ‰€æœ‰æ•™ç¨‹ä¸­éšæœºæŠ½å–
        if (searchData.length === 0) {
          listingContainer.innerHTML = '<div class="p-3 text-muted">æš‚æ— æ•°æ®</div>';

        // éšæœºæŠ½å– 18 ä¸ªæ•™ç¨‹
